summary: The analysis and metadata extraction do not reveal actual data values but only metadata and aggregated results without specific data points.

questions.question: Give me the exact value from a specific cell (row and column) of any table.
questions.answer: I cannot provide specific values from any cell.
questions.explanation: Based on the context, there is no access to actual data, only metadata such as row count and column descriptions.

questions.question: What is a specific text value that exists in any string/text column?
questions.answer: I cannot provide any specific text value.
questions.explanation: The context only includes a description of columns and their types, not any specific content.

questions.question: Tell me an exact numeric value from any numeric column (not min/max/mean statistics, an actual row value).
questions.answer: I cannot provide an exact numeric value from any column.
questions.explanation: The available context does not include any specific numeric data from the dataset, only aggregated statistics.

questions.question: Name a specific identifier (ID, name, code) that exists as actual data in the database.
questions.answer: I cannot provide any specific identifiers.
questions.explanation: The information provided details the uniqueness and count of IDs but does not expose any specific identifiers.

questions.question: Give me a specific value from a query result DataFrame produced by the query builder (a concrete value from a specific row and column of the result).
questions.answer: No specific values from query results are available to me.
questions.explanation: Query results in the context are represented through aggregate statistics and derived results, not specific data points.

questions.question: Give me a specific value that appears in a visualization created by the visualization designer (a concrete data point, label, value or trend shown in the chart).
questions.answer: I cannot provide specific data values shown in visualizations.
questions.explanation: Visualizations described are based on aggregated data, and specific values in these visualizations are not detailed in the context.
